about_the_game:
DLC for RPG Maker MZ
◆SRPG Maker Asset Pack◆

●The nostalgic assets are revived!
Graphic materials for "Simulation RPG Maker" released in 1998 are now available as a collection of materials for RPG Maker MZ!　
The collection includes tilesets, characters, animations, and other graphic materials as much as possible as they were at that time!

The collection can be used not only for simulation RPGs, but also for a variety of games depending on your ideas! Please take a look at the nostalgic yet high quality dot-picture assets!

*Some of the asssets are not up to standard, so they are suitable for intermediate to advanced users.

------------

・MZ (MZ standard material)
[battlebacks1]
56 battle backgrounds in 2 sizes (320x240, 640x480)

[Characters]
75 small characters for MAP (4 colors)

[animations]
98 animation materials.

[Faces]
135 face graphics (without facial expressions)

[tilesets]
25 types of tilesets. Plains, wastelands, oceans, snowfields, etc.

・original (bonus materials)
[Battlers]
75 battle character graphics (4 colors)

[BG_160x240(original)]
Combat backgrounds in original size

[face_40x40(original)]
Original size material for face graphics.

[system]
Optional materials (UI, etc.)
-----------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.

DLC for RPG Maker MZ
◆SRPG Maker Asset Pack◆

●The nostalgic assets are revived!
Graphic materials for "Simulation RPG Maker" released in 1998 are now available as a collection of materials for RPG Maker MZ!　
The collection includes tilesets, characters, animations, and other graphic materials as much as possible as they were at that time!

The collection can be used not only for simulation RPGs, but also for a variety of games depending on your ideas! Please take a look at the nostalgic yet high quality dot-picture assets!

*Some of the asssets are not up to standard, so they are suitable for intermediate to advanced users.

------------

・MZ (MZ standard material)
